full_text: Iglesias is owed a lot of money and hasn't been at his best this year, but getting him for Jesse Chavez and Tucker Davidson is a no-brainer for me assuming it doesn't cause unnecessary payroll constraints.

The Braves are acquiring closer Raisel Iglesias from the Angels for Jesse Chavez and Tucker Davidson, per source. Iglesias owed $48M from 2023-25 and Braves will pick up the entire contract. @ByRobertMurray was on it.
Austin Riley on Atlanta: “It’s definitely a goal to be here my entire career.”
BREAKING: The Giants.
